duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospecting and identifying new sales opportunities in the dental and medical field.
Managing existing accounts and fostering strong relationships with office-based doctors and their staff.
Achieving sales targets and maintaining a strong track record of year-over-year sales success.
Collaborating with senior sales leadership and R&D to enhance sales strategies and product offerings.
Utilizing a team-oriented and pay-on-performance approach to drive sales and achieve quota percentage attainment.
Managing expense accounts and car allowance to support sales activities.
Maintaining a strong commitment to high-quality products and driving recognition within the corporate culture.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS Degree - Activities/Leadership on campus; NCAA Sports - 4-5 years
